name: Tower Undefense
description:
Tower undefense was made to participate in the GMTK Game Jam 2020, the theme was "Out of control", so I made a tower defense, where you can`t control where to place your defenses

The game is very rough, since i have only worked for about 8 hours in the game

How to play:

You play by clicking in the weapons on the bottom of the screen, the weapon will be placed randomly on the map.

You win by defend the black block until all the soldiers that attack you are dead

You can use the buttons 1 and 2 from the keyboard to place weapons as well

Credits

I used Kenney assets packs listed bellow

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/ui-pack

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/tower-defense-top-down

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/kenney-fonts
